            GOVERNANCE AND PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION REFORM ADJUS,TF053016-DUTCH COFINANCING, KYRGYZ -

abstracts.cdata!:
This memorandum summarizes the progress
            made under the Governance Structural Adjustment Credit
            (GSAC) to the Kyrgyz Republic. Although the second tranche
            was originally planned for disbursement in mid 2004, there
            were delays in meeting some of the critical conditions,
            which were increased by unstable political conditions in the
            Kyrgyz Republic following the fall of the previous
            government in March 2005. The Kyrgyz Republic has made
            overall satisfactory progress in implementing the Program
            supported by the Governance Structural Adjustment Credit
            (Credit No. 3756-KG) and has met all conditions for release
            of the second tranche of the Credit except for two, for
            which waivers are sought.
